notes: Two farmers, members of the MNLF, were killed during an attack by assailants from Matalam town at Barangay Kibudoc, Matalam town, Cotabato province on December 1, 2018. Three other members of the MNLF were wounded while two others are missing. It is suspected that the conflict was triggered by a land dispute.

A congressman and his aid were ambushed and killed by an unidentified assailant at Barangay Burgos, Daraga town, Albay province on December 22, 2018. The mayor of the town was allegedly responsible for hiring the killers of the victims.

Four members of the MILF were killed during an attack by one MILF faction on another MILF faction in Barangay Kaya-Kaya, Datu Abdullah Sangki town, Maguindanao province on December 23, 2018. The battle occurred because of a land dispute.

On 27 Dec 2018, in Guihulngan City, Negros Oriental, five persons, including a community organizer, were killed during a simultaneous joint military and police operation called Oplan Sauron 1 against NPA members in Barangays Trinidad (2), Hilaitan (1), Buenavista (1) and Sitio Kaingan (1). Karapatan claims that the victims killed were civilians and that the evidence against them were allegedly planted by state forces. 50 others were arrested.
Soldiers from the 87th Infantry Battalion organized and attended an anti-NPA rally in Calbiga town, Samar province on December 28, 2018. 300 civilians also attended the rally.
A broadcaster was shot and killed by unidentified assailants at Barangay Poblacion, La Libertad town, Negros Oriental province on December 28, 2018.
